text: George Felix Allen (born March 8, 1952) is an American politician. He is a member of the Republican Party. He was the 67th Governor of Virginia from 1994 to 1998 and as a United States Senator from Virginia from 2001 to 2007. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Virginia Category:United States senators from Virginia Category:Politicians from California Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: George Allen (American politician)
